ValidationRule.description: Used on record type = Hiring Request. If field = Is this an Over Hire for an employee on LOA = Yes, fields Last date worked and Expected Return to work date are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (RecordType.Name = "Hiring Request", ISPICKVAL( Is_this_an_Over_Hire_for_an_employee_on__c ,"Yes"), OR( ISBLANK(Last_day_worked__c ), ISBLANK( Expected_return_to_work_date__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Is Over Hire due to employee on LOA = Yes, "Last date worked" and "Expected return to work date" are required.
